description: Throwing this eye might take you to a stronghold with an end portal.
Looks like some noble dropped their valuable silver spoon, better return it to them.
Only bad people would use this on other people to tickle them.
Luckily it didn't drop on your head. Might have hurt a bit.
Nettles also known as Urtica by these science witches. One of the worst flowers nature ever invented.
This little fella is worth quite a bit. The people of the east are said to use these creatures to make clothes.
A delicacy especially liked among the nobility. If you had a pig, you might be able to find more of them.
Alchemists use this for their potions. Next time think of this fact when you consume a health potion.
One, two, three, four, fi... Darn better luck next time.
Just a stick. Even I can't tell you more about it. It's just a stick, you know like from a tree.
Ain't no way. Poor guy, likely died from an animal or some bandits.
A delicious red apple. Maybe you find more silk worms inside this apple.
A hunk of meat. It looks like it came from some kind of animal. Nobody knows what animal.
Sapperlot nochmal some geiles beer, hopefully not a KÃ¶lsch.
Some enchanted an apple, a golden one at that. This world really is weird.
Tastes bad, but fixes ouchies.
Consuming this herb magically heals your wounds. They only grow in the Arklay mountains near Spencer's mansion.
Cheese, Gromit! Heehee! Lovely cheese, Gromit!
A hearty loaf of wheat bread, perfect for fueling your, uh, Brot und Spiele.
Look grandma made some berry pie. Might not be OUR grandma's pie but eating it is better than it getting spoiled.
A plump bunch of grapes, with a shimmering purple skin.
A vibrant fruit with fiery red scales and sweet, black seeds.
A classic. A good old sword made of iron.
Isn't it Iron Pick. Normally you use this to mine not to fight, but I guess this works too.
The weapon of a Piglin Brute. I wonder if a ruined portal is nearby.
It's unlike anything you've ever seen.
Like an iron sword but smaller, way smaller. But size doesn't matter right?
Take me to Vineland, we'll colonize it again.
Not to be confused with a claymore mine. It won't explode.
You've got the sickle, now where's the hammer, comrade?
You've got the hammer, now where's the sickle, comrade?
An expertly crafted spear, both lethal and elegant.
Find a torch and you are ready to cosplay an angry mob attendee.
Ooga booga.
The Zenith, the culmination of a journey forged into the ultimate sword.
Starfish are marine invertebrates. They typically have a central disc and usually five arms, though some species have a larger number of arms.
A shrimp is a  form of shellfish with an elongated body and a primarily swimming mode of locomotion
Clownfish or anemonefishare overall yellow, orange, or a reddish or blackish color, and many show white bars or patches.
Crabs live in all the world's oceans, in freshwater, and on land, are generally covered with a thick exoskeleton, and have a single pair of pincers on each arm.
Koi are colored varieties of carp that are kept for decorative purposes in outdoor koi ponds or water gardens.
The flesh of the blobfish is primarily a gelatinous mass with a density slightly less than that of water
They are bony fish named for their characteristic mode of predation, in which a modified luminescent fin ray acts as a lure for other fish
The majority of pufferfish species are toxic, with some among the most poisonous vertebrates in the world.
Having a head and neck suggestive of a horse, seahorses also feature segmented bony armour, an upright posture and a curled prehensile tail.
The giant squid  is a species of deep-ocean dwelling squid in the family Architeuthidae. It can grow to a tremendous size.
